item.title: Trends
item.description:
Dogecoin has recently become trending, and some of it’s biggest jumps occurred in 2021.It’s first big spike happened in January 2018. This is when it jumped from $0.002200 to $0.017100. Despite this jump, Dogecoin fell again to about $0.002083 and then plateaued at that price for about 2 years.

The year of 2021 is when it spiked dramatically due to events happening in the Stock Market and celebrities endorsing Dogecoin. This is when it’s price increased from $0.004648 in December 2020 to a maximum of $0.077372 in February 2021.Since then it has been stable at around $0.055.

item.title: About
item.description:
Dogecoin was first founded on December 6, 2013 and was created by Billy Markus and Jackson Palmer. It first began as a meme and was a cryptocurrency not meant to be taken seriously but picked up in 2020 and 2021 due to celebrity tweets from Elon MUsk and Snoop Dog.

Trading platforms to buy DogeCoin:

  • https://dogecoin.com/
  • https://robinhood.com/crypto/DOGE
  • https://tinyurl.com/3s7hk9wk
